remarks.para: May be inoperative provided anti-skid system is verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard light "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: If ANTI-SKID light on P5 is inoperative, determine that the anti-skid system is operative as follows:

numlitem.para: With electrical power on aircraft and wheels chocked, release parking brake and check that the parking brake valve is full open (see illustration).

warning.para: INSTALL DOOR LOCKS BEFORE ENTERING WHEEL WELL (REF. MAINTENANCE MANUAL 32-00-15). RAPID ACTION OF DOORS MAY INJURE PERSONNEL OR DAMAGE EQUIPMENT IF LOCKS ARE NOT PROPERLY INSTALLED.

numlitem.para: Gain access to valve, located on forward bulkhead of right main gear wheel well.
Check that the manual override handle on valve is at POS 1 (full open).
On the anti-skid/autobrake control unit in the E5-2 rack, perform the following:
Press the BIT switch to check for the absence of faults until the unit display reads TEST END.
Confirm that no faults are displayed.
Press the RESET switch to clear memory.
Restore aircraft to its required configuration.
